name: PhysiX #00
description:
This piece is inspired by op'art and physics simulation. Trying to capture the beauty and simplicity of natural movement with a minimal graphic style.

Thechnically this work is a grid of nodes that repel each other. Each node on each row is connected to its neighboor with a digital spring maintaining the equilibrium. Agents move around the canvas distirubing this equilibrium momentarily.
You can also move the mouse around the canvas.
